Pashupatinath is a famous and sacred Hindu temple located in Kathmandu
It is very beautiful temple that is listed in UNESCO World Heritage Site list.
Pashupatinath temple is a beautiful temple that has sprawling collection of temples, ashrams, images and inscriptions raised over the centuries along the banks of the sacred Bagmati river
Swayambhu Temple temple is one of the most important religious shrines in the city of Kathmandu
It is beautiful temple where people circumnavigate the temple in a clockwise direction since it is believed to wash away all the sins.
Swayambhunath temple is located on the outskirts to the west of Kathmandu. It is probably the most sacred temples among the Buddhists pilgrimage sites.
Boudhanath is a stupa located in Kathmandu which was listed under UNESCO World Heritage Site.
Boudhanath is a beautiful stupa where people circumnavigate which is believed to atone for their sins.
Patan Durbar Square is a marvel of Newar architechture. There are many temples and idols in this area. It is one of the 3 durbar squares in Kathmandu.
Patan Durbar Square is situated at the centre of the city of Lalitpur in Nepal.
Kathmandu Durbar Square (Basantapur Durbar Kshetra) is one of three Durbar (royal palace) Squares in the Kathmandu Valley in Nepal, all of which are UNESCO World Heritage Sites.
Bhaktapur retains some of its ancient way of life, reminding you of what the entire Kathmandu Valley must have looked like during the medieval period.
The Bhaktapur Durbar Square is located in the current town of Bhaktapur, also known as Khwopa, which lies 13 km east of Kathmandu.
Some of the major attractions of bhaktapur durbar square are 55 window palace, Nyatapole temple, Bhairav nath temple.

patterns: any attracting feature in seto machhindra temple
responses: Seto Machindranath is a deity worshiped by both Hindus and Buddhists in Kathmandu, Nepal. The temple is believed to have been established around the 10th century.Every year, the deity's image is placed in a chariot and paraded around Kathmandu in a festival known as Jana Baha Dyah Jatra.

patterns: i want to know about thangka paintings
where can i get thangka paintings
responses: Thangka paining is a Tibetan Buddhist painting on cotton, silk applique, usually depicting a Buddhist deity, scene, or mandala. Thangkas are traditionally kept unframed and rolled up when not on display, mounted on a textile backing somewhat in the style of Chinese scroll paintings, with a further silk cover on the front. Thangka serve as important teaching tools depicting the life of the Buddha, various influential lamas and other deities and bodhisattvas.

patterns: i want to know about thamel
can you tell me more about thamel
can you say something about thamel
responses: A buzzing, visitor-friendly area, Thamel is the city’s main nightlife zone.
Bars blast out live music by cover bands, and lively eateries serve Nepalese and international dishes in Thamel.
Thamel is everything you have been looking for in a tourist destination. Its full of life. Different shops, spas, foods, night life, music fills this place. You won't forget it once you visit there.
